texts.label: text
texts.orig: Use the attached Traffic Control Rate Schedule, for projects advertised after September 30, 2021. Include the rate schedule by special provision when Bid Item 643.0025.____ (highways) or G710.040.0000 (airports) is included in the bid schedule. Rates may be modified and additional items may be added if necessary due to project specific conditions.
texts.text: Use the attached Traffic Control Rate Schedule, for projects advertised after September 30, 2021. Include the rate schedule by special provision when Bid Item 643.0025.____ (highways) or G710.040.0000 (airports) is included in the bid schedule. Rates may be modified and additional items may be added if necessary due to project specific conditions.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The rate schedule is posted on the Statewide Construction Standards Resource web page under the heading Cost Memoranda for Work Zones: http://dot.alaska.gov/stwddes/dcsconst/index.shtml
texts.text: The rate schedule is posted on the Statewide Construction Standards Resource web page under the heading Cost Memoranda for Work Zones: http://dot.alaska.gov/stwddes/dcsconst/index.shtml
